isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 550 AND TU-FLO 750 - AIR INDUCTION

svcsubsecinfo.para: There are three methods of providing clean air to the Tu-Flo 550 and 750 compressors:

item.para: A naturally aspirated engine compressor utilizes its own attached air strainer (polyurethane sponge or pleated paper dry element).
A naturally aspirated engine compressor's inlet is connected to the engine air cleaner or the vacuum side (engine air cleaner) of the supercharger or turbocharger.

A pressurized induction engine compressor's inlet is connected to the pressure side of the supercharger or turbocharger. See the tabulated technical data, for specific requirements for numbers 2 and 3 above.

svcsubsecinfo.para: If a previously non-turbocharged compressor is being turbocharged, it is recommended that the inlet cavity screen (238948) be installed with an inlet gasket (291909) on both sides of the screen.
